tool_description: An AI URL shortener is a tool that can make long web addresses (URLs) shorter and easier to remember. It does this by taking a long URL and creating a shorter one that redirects to the original URL when clicked. This can be helpful if you want to share a link on social media or in a text message, but the original URL is too long to fit or looks cluttered. An API, or application programming interface, is a way for different pieces of software to talk to each other and share information. So an ...
title: AI URL Shortner

api_list.name: Shorten
api_list.description: This endpoint will post your shorten URL as a short Link.

optional_parameters.name: shorten
optional_parameters.description: This endpoint will return the shorten URL as a short Link

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-url-shortner.p.rapidapi.com/shorten"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-url-shortner.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send URL
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to send the long URL.
